NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_TITLE: Welcome to the KOUOSL Portal Starter
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: The KOUOSL Portal Starter is a fully-featured KOUOSL starter with many pre-built pages and best practices.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_TITLE: How to use the Portal Starter
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Assemble the various page types you want and remove the ones you don't. We've provided many common mobile app page layouts, like login and signup pages, tabs, and this tutorial page.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Need help? Check out the Portal Starter README for a full tutorial

ITEM1_ABOUT: Portal Site helps you make site.
ITEM2_ABOUT: Portal Base is base modul of Portal.
ITEM3_ABOUT: Portal Content helps manage your content.
ITEM4_ABOUT: Portal User can helps user proseses.
ITEM5_ABOUT: Portal Menu helps you create and manage menues.
ITEM6_ABOUT: Portal Theme gives you easy and usefull theme.
ITEM7_ABOUT: Portal Gii provides you code generator.
